summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The DVD_PLAYBACK_LOCATION2 structure indicates DVD playback location.

member.name: DVD_PLAYBACK_LOCATION2.TitleNum
member.summary: Title number for the whole disc (not the track number of the Video Title Set).

member.name: DVD_PLAYBACK_LOCATION2.ChapterNum
member.summary: Part-of-title number with title. 0xffffffff if not a simple linear movie.

member.name: DVD_PLAYBACK_LOCATION2.TimeCode
member.summary: Timecode. Use for current playback time. 0xffffffff if not a simple linear movie.
